bwwExcerpt: Ultimately, Rice finds too much of herself and too little of Coward. She deploys his plot and his songs, but her ironic flashiness illustrates rather than penetrates the punishing emotions of the film.

keyPhrases.quote: Rice finds too much of herself and too little of Coward.
